Verses: 1 aagaiyaal, Naangal Inip Poruththirukkakkoodaamal, Aththene Pattanaththil Thaniththuvidappadugiradhu Nanmaiyendru Ninaiththu,

2 indha Ubaththiravangalinaale Oruvanum Asaikkappadaadhapadikku Ungalaith Thidappaduththavum, Ungal Visuvaasaththaippatri Ungalukkup Buththisollavum, Nammudaiya Sagodharanum Dheva Oozhiyakkaaranum Kiristhuvin Suviseshaththil Engal Udanvelaiyaalumaagiya Theemoththeyuvai Anuppinom.
3 ippadippatta Ubaththiravangalai Sagikka Naam Niyamikkappattirukkiromendru Neengal Arindhirukkireergale.
4 namakku Ubaththiravam Varumendru Naangal Ungalidaththilirundhapodhu, Ungalukku Munnariviththom; Appadiye Vandhu Nerittadhendrum Arindhirukkireergal.

5 aagaiyaal, Naan Inip Poruththirukkakkoodaamal, Engal Velai Veenaaip Pogaththakkadhaaga Sodhanaikkaaran Ungalai Sodhanaikkutpaduththinadhundovendru, Ungal Visuvaasaththai Ariyumpadikku, Avanai Anuppinen.

6 ippozhudhu Theemoththeyu Ungalidaththilirundhu Engalidaththil Vandhu, Ungal Visuvaasaththaiyum Anbaiyum Kuriththum, Neengal Eppozhudhum Engalaip Patchamaai Ninaiththukkondu, Naangal Ungalaik Kaana Vaanjaiyaayirukkiradhupola Neengalum Engalaik Kaana Vaanjaiyaayirukkireergalenbadhaikkuriththum, Engalukku Narseydhisonnadhinaale,
7 sagodharare, Engalukku Neritta Ellaa Ikkattilum Ubaththiravaththilum Ungal Visuvaasaththinaale Ungalai Kuriththu Aarudhaladaindhom.
9 melum, Nammudaiya Dhevanukku Munbaaga Naangal Ungalaikkuriththu Adaindhirukkira Migundha Sandhoshaththirkaaga, Naangal Dhevanukku Evvidhamaai Sthoththiram Seluththuvom?
10 ungal Mugaththaik Kandu, Ungal Visuvaasaththin Kuraivugalai Niraivaakkumporuttu, Iravum Pagalum Migavum Vendikkolgirome.
11 nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanum Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvum Ungalidaththirku Engalai Neraaga Vazhinadaththuvaaraaga.

12 naangal Ungalidaththil Vaiththirukkira Anbukkoppaai, Neengalum Oruvaridaththil Oruvar Vaikkum Anbilum Matrellaa Manusharidaththil Vaikkum Anbilum Karththar Ungalaip Perugavum Nilaiththongavum Seydhu,

13 ivvidhamaai Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhu Thamadhu Parisuththavaangal Anaivarodunkooda Varumbodhu, Neengal Nammudaiya Pidhaavaagiya Dhevanukku Munbaagap Pizhaiyatra Parisuththamullavargalaayirukkumpadi Ungal Irudhayangalai Sthirappaduththuvaaraaga.
